title: Mid-tier backs for sale (heavy on rare 150-350 Old Mills)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Mid-tier backs for sale (heavy on rare 150-350 Old Mills)
posts.post_content:
Shipping is an additional $4.  Prices assume a no-fee payment method.  I just included a sampling of scans here as I think I will add to this list and it will end up pretty long.  If you'd like to see any not listed, please PM or email me.  Make sure you give me an email to send to.  My email is [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]



Burchell Tolstoi SGC 10 $100

Armbruster Cycle 350 SGC 3 $289

Downey AB350 SGC 1 $125

Goode Old Mill SGC 30 $125

Nicholls Old Mill SGC 40 $289

Bowerman Old Mill PSA 4 $885

Herzog NY Old Mill PSA 3.5 $400

Parent Old Mill PSA 1.5 $215

Duffy Tolstoi SGC A (hand-cut scrap) $269

Bergen bat Old Mill SGC 30 $115

McGraw finger in air Old Mill PSA 1 $165

Tannehill Old Mill PSA 1.5 $145

Abbaticchio brown sleeves Old Mill PSA 3 $239 SOLD

Phillippe EPDG PSA 4 (case has some issues, card is fine) $209

Bender no trees Old Mill PSA 5mc $339

Kleinow Boston Polar Bear SGC 1 $135

Kleinow Boston Tolstoi SGC 1.5 (very nice for grade) $319

Grimshaw Cycle 350 SGC 1.5 $139

Bergen Tolstoi PSA 3mc $119

Donlin Seated Old Mill SGC 10 $99

Hemphill Old Mill SGC 40 $389

Bates Old Mill PSA 2 $209 SOLD
Fantastic cards.  Wish I needed any of these, I’d be all over them!
I need to check this page more often. I could have used the Bates. Oh well. Lately it's a timing thing. When somethings available, while I have the money.
